projects.name: Tutorials
projects.author: Nick Pope
projects.description: Some tutorials on various aspects of the environment.

projects.name: Purse
projects.author: Meurig Beynon
projects.description: Learn the basics of construals by exploring taking money out of purse and putting it back again.

projects.name: Construing a Vending Machine From Scratch
projects.author: Meurig Beynon and Elizabeth Hudnott
projects.description: Learn to make something non-trivial from scratch.

projects.name: Giving Change
projects.author: Meurig Beynon
projects.description: Explore giving change using a greedy coin selection method.

projects.name: Room Experiment
projects.author: Nick Pope
projects.description: Explore different ways of expressing geometry to make a room plan.

projects.name: Hex Colouring
projects.author: Jonny Foss and Meurig Beynon
projects.description: A puzzle game where you colour-in hexagons.

projects.name: Clayton Tunnel
projects.author: Nick Pope
projects.description: Partial construal of a famous railway disaster.

projects.name: Shopping
projects.author: Meurig Beynon, Jonny Foss and Steve Russ

projects.name: Grid Algebra (work in progress)
projects.author: Nick Pope, Elizabeth Hudnott, Jonny Foss and Meurig Beynon in conversation
projects.description: Example of using scoping to produce a multiplication table.
